snippet: Driven by dreams of better lives for themselves and Confucian filial piety for their parents, young women emigrated from Vietnam to marry older South Korean men.
abstract: Quang Yen Journal; young Vietnamese women, driven by dreams of better lives for themselves and their parents, increasingly emigrate to marry older South Korean men, sending money back home to villages like Quang Yen; competitive South Korean marriage marketplace gave birth to a booming industry of marriage brokers who take Korean men on tours of Vietnam and other developing nations to meet potential wives.
lead_paragraph: Driven by dreams of better lives for themselves and Confucian filial piety for their parents, young women emigrated from Vietnam to marry older South Korean men.

headline.seo: For Some in Vietnam, Prosperity Is a South Korean Son-in-Law
headline.main: For Some in Vietnam, Prosperity Is a South Korean Son-in-Law
headline.print_headline: For Some in Vietnam, Prosperity Is a South Korean Son-in-Law
